title: Replace Apple Developer broken link
author: iqfareez
details: Fixed a broken Apple Developer documentation link in the macOS runner limitations file by updating the URL path from `/manage-profiles/` to `/provisioning-profiles/` for creating development provisioning profiles.

raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Fixed a broken Apple Developer documentation link in the macOS runner limitations file by updating the URL path from `/manage-profiles/` to `/provisioning-profiles/` for creating development provisioning profiles.

### Title  
Fix broken Apple Developer link in macOS runner docs
